sections.label: Intro 1
content: Em C Dsus4 x2 picked
Em C D x2 Stummed

sections.label: Verse 1
content: Em C D
I took a walk around the world to ease my troubled mind
Em C D
I left my body laying somewhere in the sands of time
Em C D
I watched the world float to the dark side of the moon
Em C D Em C Dsus4 Em C Dsus4
I feel there is nothing I can do, yeah

sections.label: Verse 2
content: Em C D
I watched the world float to the dark side of the moon
Em C D
After all I knew it had to be something to do with you
Em C D
I really don't mind what happens now and then
Em C D
As long as you'll be my friend at the end

sections.label: Chorus 1
content: Em C D
If I go crazy then will you still call me Superman
Em C D
If I'm alive and well, will you be there holding my hand
Em C D Em Em C D
I'll keep you by my side with my superhuman might Kryptonite

sections.label: Instrumental 1
content: Em C Dsus4 x 2

sections.label: Verse 3
content: Em C D
You called me strong, you called me weak but your secrets I will keep
Em C D
You took for granted all the times I never let you down
Em C D
You stumbled in and bumped your head, if not for me then you would be dead
Em C D
I picked you up and put you back on solid ground

sections.label: Chorus 2
content: Em C D
If I go crazy then will you still call me Superman
Em C D
If I'm alive and well, will you be there holding my hand
Em C D Em Em C D
I'll keep you by my side with my superhuman might Kryptonite

sections.label: Instrumental 2
content: Em C Dsus4 x 4 (picked)

content: Em C D

content: Em   C   Dsus4
